function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low diversity of suppliers or buyers in supply chains increasing the probability of disruption and propagation of shocks.","Impact":"Disruptions in the supply chain and propagation of shocks can lead to shortages, production delays, and economic consequences.","Mitigation":"Increase diversity of suppliers and buyers, establish alternative supply sources, and develop contingency plans for supply chain disruptions.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, blockchain for transparent supply chain tracking, and predictive analytics for identifying potential disruptions.","People":"Supply chain managers, procurement teams, and policymakers.","Owner":"Supply chain managers, procurement teams, and policymakers."},{"Description":"Concentration of suppliers and buyers leading to fragility in the supply chain and market.", "Impact":"Limited leeway to switch to new supply sources in case of shortages, inability to buffer demand shocks, and large consequences on upstream firms.","Mitigation":"Encourage diversification of suppliers and buyers, develop flexible sourcing strategies, and promote collaboration between suppliers and buyers.","Technologies":"Supplier relationship management systems, demand forecasting tools, and market intelligence platforms.","People":"Supply chain managers, procurement teams, and market analysts.","Owner":"Supply chain managers, procurement teams, and market analysts."}]}
